description: Build a modular HTML tools platform with shared CSS and components. Create homepage with sticky header, collapsible sidebar, and sticky footer. Establish foundation for multiple tool applications (orchestrator, coderef-context, coderef-workflow, coderef-docs) using vanilla JavaScript.
goal: Create a shared HTML/CSS/JS architecture that all web tools can build upon, with consistent design system, reusable components, and maintainable structure.
requirements: Shared CSS variables system with dark theme palette
Reusable component library (buttons, cards, inputs, modals, badges)
constraints: Follow existing coderef-system design from packages/web/styles.css
